algorithm_technique: Trie construction to store prefixes and counts
Traverse Trie for each word to sum prefix scores
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the sum of scores for all prefixes of each word in a given list.
problem_summary_technical: Utilize a Trie to store all words, counting occurrences of each prefix. Then, for each word, traverse its prefixes in the Trie to sum their counts.
key_insights: A Trie is ideal for prefix-related problems, efficiently storing and querying prefixes.
Storing prefix counts directly in Trie nodes avoids redundant calculations.
The total space complexity depends on the total number of unique prefixes across all words.
